mapper.insert: insert into doc_api( name, parent_id, content, create_time, user_id )values( #{name}, #{parent_id}, #{content}, #{create_time}, #{user_id} )
mapper.update: update doc_api set is_del = '1' where id=#{id}
update doc_api set content = #{content}, name=#{name} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT(a.id) as id, a.name, a.parent_id from doc_api a
LEFT JOIN doc_api b ON a.id=b.parent_id
where a.is_del=0
and a.parent_id=#{doc_id}
and (a.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or b.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.content, a.user_id, a.create_time, b.nick_name from doc_api a left join doc_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.id=#{id} and a.is_del=0
